728909f-a.title: Richmond: Hannah Street - Bay Street
728909f-a.text:
Hannah Street, south side, west from Bay Street (fore-
ground), to Van Duzer Street. The tall building, in the back-
ground, is Engine So. 154, New York Fire Dept., at the S. W.
corner of Hannah and Van Duzer Streets.
April 15, 1932
P.L. Sperr
728909f-a.folder: Hannah Street & Bay Street, Staten Island, NY

728529f-a.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Hannah Street
728529f-a.text:
Bay Street, at the N. W. corner of Hannah Street. The
site is occupied by the used car department of the Robbins Reef
Motor Company.
Septmeber 9, 1937
P. L. Sperr
728529f-a.folder: Bay Street & Hannah Street, Staten Island, NY
